Text: RE Agreement Cc Good morning ladies Just wanted to ensure that this current discussion with Bevin is resolving the Performance Bond issue which you had mentioned to me If so I can step out and leave you in Bevins good hands For my own information because I havent dealt with these details before is a Performance Bond needed in addition to this agreement Michele A Blanco PE Manager Asset Optimization Calpine Corporation Western Region Dublin Blvd Dublin CA Fax Original Message From Bevin Hong Sent Friday November AM To Lorraine Lindberg Email Cc Michele Blanco Nithya Venkatesan Subject FW Agreement Lorraine Thanks for your suggestion in looking for it internally here Its a hit and miss when it comes to getting anything from Chad since hes always on the road Attached is what he sent I just figured it would be easier to get a TW Ft agreement from TW I assumed wrong Hopefully we can get the credit issues resolved Bevin Original Message From Chad Driskill Sent Friday November AM To Bevin Hong Subject Agreement

RE Consent AssignmentHello Michelle I received the faxdsigned copy thanks so much Again per my vmail I corrected the name of the Assignor company in the first signatory block the Assignor is legally Calpine Construction Finance Corp the successor to a merger with CPN South Point LLC and I added Jake Rudisills name and title in the first signatory block So Ill replace the first page of the document you are sending to me with the first page in this updated file have signed and return an executed copy to youLorraine Thanks again I appreciate your assistance Michele A Blanco PE Manager Asset Optimization Calpine Corporation Western Region Dublin Blvd Dublin CA Fax Original Message From Lokay Michelle mailtoMichelle NRONcom Sent Wednesday October AM To Michele Blanco Subject RE Consent Assignment Upon our routing for exection yesterday Legal made an additional change I have attached an updated electronic agreement with this latest change back to a threepart signature document and will get this executed today Original Message From Michele Blanco mailto Sent Tuesday October PM To Lokay Michelle Subject RE The new Consent to Assignment Michelle Thanks for facilitating After Transwestern signs we will ratify onabout the date of the closing I will return the final ratified copy to your office Please have signed and fax to me then please mail original to me for ratification Thanks again Michele A Blanco PE Manager Asset Optimization Calpine Corporation Western Region Dublin Blvd Dublin CA Fax Original Message From Lokay Michelle mailtoMichelle NRONcom Sent Tuesday October PM To Michele Blanco Subject RE The new Consent to Assignment Michele Tony wanted the title changed to Ratification Agreement and Consent to Assignment and the following sentence added Effective as of Assignee ratifies the Assigned Agreement and assumes the obligations of Assignee thereunder as if Assignee had been originally named therein Question Not being an attorney shouldnt it read assumes the obligations of Assignor The assignor is the original party right Original Message From Michele Blanco mailto Sent Tuesday October PM To Lokay Michelle Subject The new Consent to Assignment New TW Consentdoc Michelle My regrets for the delay in getting this to you however prompted by the comments supplied by your legal counsel weve discovered and are verifying that the first Consent to Assignment Agreement that we forwarded to Lorraine referenced the WRONG Agreement a possible mistake on our part and if it turns out to be so something we regret happened Again I will confirm once my legal team confirms Instead it has become painfully obvious that the Agreement that should have been referenced in the Consent to Assignment document is the Measurement and Control Facilities Operating Agreement dated February between Transwestern and CPN South Point LLC now Calpine Construction Finance Company LP as successor by merger to CPN South Point LLC The New Consent provided above has been modified and we suspect that no edits will be necessary To confirm South Point Energy Center LLC will be funded with assets transferred from Calpine Construction Finance Company LP at the closing scheduled for Oct Your facilitation of the Consent to Assignment is appreciated pls contact me with any questions Michele A Blanco PE Manager Asset Optimization Calpine Corporation Western Region Dublin Blvd Dublin CA Fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use The new Consent to AssignmentNew TW Consentdoc Michelle My regrets for the delay in getting this to you however prompted by the comments supplied by your legal counsel weve discovered and are verifying that the first Consent to Assignment Agreement that we forwarded to Lorraine referenced the WRONG Agreement a possible mistake on our part and if it turns out to be so something we regret happened Again I will confirm once my legal team confirms Instead it has become painfully obvious that the Agreement that should have been referenced in the Consent to Assignment document is the Measurement and Control Facilities Operating Agreement dated February between Transwestern and CPN South Point LLC now Calpine Construction Finance Company LP as successor by merger to CPN South Point LLC The New Consent provided above has been modified and we suspect that no edits will be necessary To confirm South Point Energy Center LLC will be funded with assets transferred from Calpine Construction Finance Company LP at the closing scheduled for Oct Your facilitation of the Consent to Assignment is appreciated pls contact me with any questions Michele A Blanco PE Manager Asset Optimization Calpine Corporation Western Region Dublin Blvd Dublin CA Fax
